ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from populating the Follow Up Date when setting the Status to ‘Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received’.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( NOT(ISNULL(Follow_Up_Date__c)) ), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Pending PAC Review - Transferring New to D/E") , ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Pending PAC Review - Reassign to New ORR") ), $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot populate the Follow Up Date when the Status = ‘Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received’, 'Pending PAC Review – Transferring New to D/E', or 'Pending PAC Review – Reassign to New ORR'.
